First they came for OpenCode, and you did not speak out.

Then they came for Clawdbot, and you did not speak out - because you thought ‚ÄúMolty‚Äù was a cute name.

In the end, they came for the users, and there was no one left.

The observation is anecdotal, based on one flight with a photo showing Mac Minis in first class. Clawdbot is a real open-source AI tool using Claude AI, and premium plans exist, but there's no evidence this is a universal trend across flights. It's likely highlighting tech divides humorously.
The hacker waiting for you to install #Clawdbot on your computer so they can gain access to your entire system. https://t.co/hbdLEbyLP5
@TrungTPhan Naw, wouldn't he just have his own Clawdbot/Moltbot do it for him?  (I don't love the name Moltbot; can y'all come up with something better that doesn't violate trademark?)

ClawdBot (I refuse to call it the other name) has two big innovations that you‚Äôd think would be easy for Anthropic / xAI / OpenAI to just add to their stack:

- Killer memory management 
- Cron scheduling that allows the LLM to ‚Äúwake up‚Äù and start processing prompts, unprovoked.
- Messaging based interactions allowing users to add their agent to Discord, Slack, iMessages, etc.

How long until these are base level capabilities for all model vendors?

Hey @moltbot (@clawdbot / Clawdbot) people! ü¶Ä

I've run meticulous AI security review (Codex 5.2 High) on Clawdbot's codebase (latest 2026.1.24 release) across 5 surface attack vectors, and it found 37 potential vulnerabilities related to misconfiguration (incl top 10 reported yesterday).

O assistente de IA viral Clawdbot foi renomeado para Moltbot em 27 de janeiro ap√≥s a empresa Anthropic solicitar a mudan√ßa por quest√µes de marca registrada, citando semelhan√ßa com ‚ÄúClaude‚Äù, seu modelo de IA de mesmo nome. Moltbot mant√©m o mesmo c√≥digo-fonte e prop√≥sito de assistente open source, capaz de executar tarefas como agendar voos, gerenciar e-mails e automatizar fluxos de trabalho em mensageiros, operando localmente no computador do usu√°rio e usando modelos de IA para racioc√≠nio e gera√ß√£o de c√≥digo. A mudan√ßa de nome gerou instabilidade tempor√°ria nas contas e ‚Äúhandles‚Äù, com terceiros aproveitando para promover tokens falsos e causar confus√£o em plataformas como GitHub e X. A renomea√ß√£o foi implementada rapidamente para evitar disputas legais e reduzir confus√£o de marca. 

Resumido por LLM com base em ‚ÄúViral AI Sidekick ‚ÄòClawdbot‚Äô Changes Name To ‚ÄòMoltbot‚Äô And Sheds Its Old Skin‚Äù do site ‚ÄúForbes‚Äù.
